ygData.subject: Question about experience gain
ygData.msgSnippet: The other day I (25 bard) grouped with a 20 druid to take on crag spiders in East Karana.  On a few occasions, we would also fight mobs that were green to me
ygData.messageBody:
The other day I (25 bard) grouped with a 20 druid to take on crag spiders in
East Karana. On a few occasions, we would also fight mobs that were green
to me but blue to the druid. When we killed then, I did not receive
experience points but he did. Lets assume that when we killed a crag
spider, I got 55% of the total experience and he got 45% due to our level
difference. When we killed the mobs that gave me no experience, did he get
100% or 45%? I would guess he only got 45% but want to get a confirmation.


Galtin of E'ci
